'''Hilichurl Shooters''' are [[Hilichurls]] who use crossbows in battle.

In combat, they fire single bolts at the player matching their elemental type. In some [[Domains]], [[Events]] and [[Commissions]], they will fire five bolts in a ~45 degree spread in front of them instead.
